HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Replace Stuff now will place modded bridges when needed. You can set a preference of which bridge to build in the settings. (It will still prefer bridges you have resources for)

Replace Stuff (Continued) has been updated for RimWorld 1.6!
- Updated mod compatibility for RimWorld 1.6 - Fixed logging issues with new RimWorld API - Maintained all existing functionality for building replacement and cooler placement
Thanks to Uuugggg for the original mod!
